set.compile:
PACKAGE_NAME=cryptplug PACKAGE_VERSION=0.3.16
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz
#oeg_include_files AUTHORS COPYING* README
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin bin64 # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
